request.schema: {"type":"object","title":"Slack API Request","description":"Slack API request schema.","properties":{"auth":{"type":"object","title":"Authentication","description":"Authentication parameters for the Slack API.","required":["bearerToken"],"properties":{"bearerToken":{"type":"string","title":"Bearer Token","description":"Bearer token for authentication with the Slack API."}}},"body":{"type":"object","title":"Request Body","description":"Body of the Slack API request.","required":["channel","text"],"properties":{"blocks":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"elements":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"text":{"type":"string","title":"Text","description":"Text content of the element."},"type":{"type":"string","title":"Type","description":"Type of the element."}}}},"text":{"type":"object","title":"Text Object","description":"Text object for the message block.","properties":{"text":{"type":"string","title":"Text","description":"Text content of the text object."},"type":{"type":"string","title":"Type","description":"Type of the text object."}}},"type":{"type":"string","title":"Type","description":"Type of the message block."},"fields":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"text":{"type":"string","title":"Text","description":"Text content of the field."},"type":{"type":"string","title":"Type","description":"Type of the field."}}}}}}},"channel":{"type":"string","title":"Channel ID","description":"Slack channel ID to send the message to."},"text":{"type":"string","title":"Message Text","description":"Plain text message."}}}}}
request.uiCode: {"actionType":"map","target":{"auth":{"actionType":"map","target":{"bearerToken":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{auth.bearerToken}}","targetType":"string","actions":[],"enum":[],"title":"Bearer Token","description":"Bearer token for authentication with the Slack API.","isRequred":true,"default":"","autoEscape":"MANUAL"}} ,"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]},"body":{"actionType":"map","target":{"channel":{"actionType":"map","target":"#ai_testing","targetType":"string","title":"Channel ID"},"text":{"actionType":"map","target":"{{data.steps.flattenOrderDetails.output.flattenedRow[1]}}","targetType":"string","title":"Message Text"}},"targetType":"object","actions":[],"default":[]}}
